values: "Oh what twisted webs we weave When one's plotting to deceive..." One expects no less. It's... odd, really. I know... what do I call it?... Marik's ka is inside of me, and yet... it's so strange... Darling is still in fits... bitter about the entire situation... still threatening Mahaado about how he should have finished the job...when I am thankful that he spared Marik's life... I had only expected for one to take my own, after what i had done. No, Darling, I am not turning back on you... do not fret. I still love you more than anything in the world. I will not, however, shout and fit in Mahaado's face about what he SHOULD have done. What's done is done. It would be best to sit back, and let things go their course. You, for one, are in no condition to be doing anything... and nor am I. I suppose I'll just call him Ra... Ra is taking up a lot of heka, so much that my powers are very limited. In fact, due to the fact that I have not used my powers, good nor bad, in such a long time, Ra is requiring that I give him a lot of my own physical energy. It's not too bad yet; after all I just get a bit short-winded. I expect it to be far worse after I being... showing. Darling, please. Just sit back. And make sure you ka remains okay, as well as I. Right now, we are both essential to your survival. --Atemu [Far longer than forever I swear that I'll be true I've made an everlasting vowel... To find a way to you Far longer than forever Like no love ever known And with your love I'll never... Be alone... Far longer than forever As constant as a star I close my eyes and I am... Where you are As sure as the dawn brings the sunrise We've an unshakable bond Destined to last for a lifetime and beyond Far longer than forever I swear that I'll be true I've made an everlasting vowel... To find a way to you Far longer than forever Like no love ever known And with your love I'll never... Be alone...]

Domino has always been a very peaceful city... despite it's cases of... extreme oddities here and there.

Paon, suffering, and mental and physical turmoil were never something I indulged in, but, I quickly learned during my little playtime with Kisara, that I should have been on the side of evil intent long ago.

It's enjoyable, and I think everyone should give it a try, don't you think?

I think Maru will mesh nicely into our little home, don't you agree Darling?

...And my Sennen Puzzle works better than ever before.  Not surprising, I suppose.  These items were mean to secreet their greatest strengths in the cold darkness.

--Atemu Niu

Marik finally found me!  Now we're staying in a very classy hotel together... and good, too.  He knows my tastes... and we certainly had fun together last night...

Ugh, this show, "I, Detective", is too bitchin' easy. D=<

Ah well.

<3 Darling, I hope when we get back to Domino we can have some fun together.

;D And thanks for the wonderful present.

--Atemu Niu

Darling, I need your help.

Now.

And my cell phone has been stolen, so this shit computer at this hotel is all I have going for me.

...By the way, I'm in America.

--Atemu

Not much to do without you here, Darling...

--Atemu

((OCC; O.M.R  i'm back >__> But not for long.  Sorry guys--I'll probably be on Hiatus come April 20th until... sometime after @__@  Reason being: GUESS WHAT?!  i'm moving again.))

"Oh, things are so much more entertaining when you're on the side of total darkness. I was a fool for not realizing this before. All my good intentions and sacrificing have done for me is screw me over. Noa, Seth, Kaiba, Seto, and all the other fucks I could have done without made me pathetic. I most certainly am not that. Katsuya, Shiz... if you happen to see a blazing fire not too far from here, fret not. I'm not coming after you, my dears. Hikari, you may as well put your fears to rest. I shant let any harm come over you. ...And Darling, next time you teach me hand-to-hand combat, lets get a bit more... ROUGH, shall we? I'm an awfully fast learner... don't you think?" [OOC: Sorry the VP is so fuzzy. Cell phones and doing it while in a car can do that to you. =|]

ALLOW ME TO GET ALL OF THIS OUT OF THE WAY TO THOSE WHO ARE CURIOUS
Yes, I am with Yami no Marik as of now. He's my darling, after all. Yes, I am teaming up with him. And yes, I do have the Sennen Puzzle in my possession. ...Sucks for you, hm? <3 Precious

So, I've gotten back the Puzzle from Yuugi, after letting him keep hold of it for an entire year.  Has it really been that long?  I suppose it has...

With the Sennen puzzle back with me, however, it should be safe... after all, I have learned how to use it's powers well.

--Atemu

...Now what...? [I don't mind it here. Really, I don't. Yami no Marik made a big, grande entrance when he kidnapped me from Seto's house. So now, I'm here with him. ...It... it's odd, but... maybe... Maybe he's RIGHT. ...Maybe... ...Maybe Noa won't ever come for me. ...Ever. So was I wrong to continue hoping he would? That this time when he came back, he'd be back... for good? I hurt so many others relying on this... Seth... Seth especially. I'm glad he's happy with Atem. I couldn't ever... ...Well, I suppose it doesn;t matter anymore, now, does it...? Sometimes Life takes you by the neck and chokes you. Things change.]

A few nights ago Kaiba went home drunk from Seto's house. =D And I had the honor of driving the ungrateful bastard back.

Of course, Seto pitched a fit, but I suppose I have to get used to that...

My leg is nearly healed now.  I can manuver around without the crutch, but with it I at least don't feel the dull pain that runs up my leg when I move.

I wonder how long Noa plans to keep me here...?

--Atemu

I seem to be all over the place lately .__. Noa dropped me off at Seto's house and I'm currently in "my room", as he likes to call it.  This is awkward.

Seto seems to be a bit more pleasant than usual.  Not saying that he usually ISN'T pleasant towards me, but... something about him seems a bit more... cheerful.  I wonder what it is.

...I fear Noa is going to try something stupid against Yami no Marik... that boy should really think things through...

--Atemu

Sorry I haven;t updated in quite sometime.  I've been rather too tired to do such a thing as of late...

I'm still recovering for the nasty plunge I took last month... luckily, I can now walk, as long as I have a crutch to help myself.  However, Noa refuses to let me out of the house unless Im with him, so he's been trying to do a large portion of his Kaiba Corporation work here at the apartment <strike>even though even IF I wanted to walk around on my own outside, I would most likely get tired as soon as I made it to the elevator</strike>.

My agents and such have decided it would be best for me to drop modeling and acting, which, puts a huge damper on the new show about to be aired.  If I recover well enough, I may return to the show to finish it up.  Perhapes they'll kill off my character, or send him off somewhere so I don;t have to show for a season or so, who knows?  Also, as for singing...

I seemed to have suffered a rupture in my throat which, I will be able to talk properly in a matter of weeks, btu singing... will most likely be out of the question for the rest of my life.

...I suppose I should be thankful, however, that I am still alive.

<strike><small>Even if singing was the one thing for a while that could truly set me free.</small></strike>

...I'm thinking about picking back up Duel Monsters... I wonder if anyone would offer to practice with me?

--Atemu

I was moved to another room this morning. The other one was quite a mess. [...Now what...? I can;t believe Marik DID that to me... ...And... I can't believe I let him. Noa's going to find out. I know he will... maybe not now, but eventually. he always has a way of finding these things out. I'm ashamed I even let this happen to me... I could have stopped him... ...Couldn't I...? Another odd thing... after... the deed was done, Marik wrapped me up in his cloak and then put me back on the bed. I don't understand his actions. First be breaks into my room to kill me, then he rapes me and then leaves me alive when he could have easily killed me AFTERWARDS? ...I don't understand.] In other news, I'm going to be let out of the hospital on the 23rd! Just in time for Christmas... ...Seto, why haven't you come and seen me...? --Atemu

I'm very tired.  Looks like I took quite the tumble--I need a blood transfusion and everything.

For those who came to visit me, thank you.  I seem to have a room stuffed with flowers from fans ^^;

I also hear there's some sort of conspiracy that I was pushed off the fifth floor.   Whether or not that's true or not, I'm not too sure.  I don't remember much between the morning it happened and until I woke up in the hospital four days later.

The doctors say I just need to rest awhile.

I hate hospitals.

<small>...Especially ever since Horus and Seth came along...</small>

<lj-cut text="Private">

<small>[Noa finally got the answer out of me whether or not I'm going to marry him.  I was planning to tell him on Christmas (I even have a band I got him while in Osaka) as his gift, but I guess I can still give him the ring, even if it's not nearly as sweet as it would have been.

...I guess nearly dying does things to people.

...Speaking of which... what am I going to do?  I can't go back to modeling...

...Not with all these scars...]</small></lj-cut>


--Atemu Niu
*currently passed out at Skip-Bo Hospital* XDDD

I think I've been needing to write this for awhile...

<lj-cut text="Screened to Seth">
<small>[Seth: I see you've gotten yourself back in the hospital again.  I don't mind the fact that you seem to hate me now, but please, just be careful.  We may not be together, but I DO worry over you, alright?  it just comes with being who I am.]</small></lj-cut>

<lj-cut text="Screened to Atem">
<small>[Atem: I am not trying to get back with Seth, so you don't have to worry about it, alright?  But Seth was, and still is very important, and I came to the hospital only to see that he was alright, and that he's okay.  So please.  you threatening someone to stay away from him when he plans on do just that doesn't make you look very good.  Or civilized.]</small></lj-cut>

<lj-cut text="Screened to Seto">
<small>[Seto: I'm sorry I said all those horrible things upon leaving your mansion with Seth.  I know I made a horrible mistake, and I did the most awful thing to you, and I can only hope you'll forgive me for it.  I wasn't thinking atraight, a lot of emotions were swirling with me at the time, but I know that's not a good excuse.  I'm sorry.  We need to talk.  Please.]</small></lj-cut>

<lj-cut text="Screened to Amane">
<small>[Amane: You're doing good so far.  Please take care of Seto twice as hard, for me?]</small></lj-cut>

<lj-cut text="Screened to Katsuya">
<small>[Katsuya: You're doing wonderful.  Your launch was a big success, and I am very proud of you.  I hear they've got you on a horribly strict diet--don't worry.  Follow through for a month, and they'll begin to cut you some slack and begin to allow your favorite things back.  They'll start to work in more excerise so you can eat how you want, later on.  Stay strong, and keep it up.  Love you.]</small></lj-cut>

<lj-cut text="Screened to Shiz">
<small>[Shiz: I didn't come see you because I left directly after visiting to fly back to Osaka.  I'm sorry I'm so busy, or I would come see you and your brother often.  Please don't be mad at me.  Take care of yourself, alright?  How are things with Other Me?]</small></lj-cut>

<lj-cut text="Screened to Yuugi">
<small>[Yuugi: I'm sorry for being such a horrible other half.  I've seen you the least out of everyone.  perhaps when I'm finished filming the first quarter of the first season on shows, I can come anf visit you and see how you're doing?  Take care.  Love you, hikari.]</small></lj-cut>

<lj-cut text="Screened to Noa">
<small>[Noa: Sorry I haven't been home since we got together again. .///. I'll try harder... its just that this TV show seems to be consuming my life!  The role I play is very much angst-ridden--I'll have to show you sometime.  Also, is Ramses doing alright?  I miss him, a lot.  I hope he is able to keep you good company.  And don't work yourself to death.  Ra knows you need more sleep. <strike>Because, I assure you, you won't be getting any when I get back home.</strike> Take care.  I love you.]</small></lj-cut>

...Now that I have all of that taken care of...

Osaka is boring.  There's not a lot to do when I'm not on the set, so I just kind of go and pass out at the hotel room when I'm done.  Playing an emo-angst ridden teenager takes a lot out of you, you know.

Other than that, life is going.  Not as smooth as I'd like it do, but getting there.

...Noa being back after... all of that... certainly is a big factor in that.

<lj-cut text="Private"> 

<small>[Seeing Noa's name light up on my cellphone when he calls, talking to him, hearing his voice, all these things make me realize all over again why I was in love with him.  He had pulled me out from a sorry rut, and will continue to do so again and again.  I have no doubt in that.  As long as he does't leave again.  I know it wasn't his fault, even though I was so angry I blamed him forever (and I still blame Kaiba, since he refuses to talk with me) until he came back.  I just can't imagine life without him again.  It was so hard the first time he left.  Which, is why I had to break things with Seth, even though it hurt him.  But he doesn't seem to get that it also hurt me.  It's not like I didn't feel anything when I eventually broke the news to him.

I hate seeing people's faces like that, and I hate it even more when I'm the cause of it.

Thanksgiving is coming up.  I have a feeling noa will want to spend it with Kaiba and Moki, so I'm just going to have to swallow my fear/butterflies/anger amd just deal with it.  It's only one day.  Just one.  Besides, I refuse to spend it by myself in a hotel room, like I did last year.

...Not now that I have someone.  To be strong when I can't be... which, unfortunateky, since my dueling days (or at least aince after Horus and Seth took over my body... I STILL have nightmares about that shit...), I seem to have lost a lost of.]</small></lj-cut>

--Atemu Niu

I went and visited Seth a couple of days ago.

......

...Sad, how life works.

<small>I just hope he'll be alright...</small>

--Atemu Niu

...Seth.

...Where are you?  You've been missing for over two days...

I wandered the streets, I looked down the alley, glanced around Seto's mansion grounds (knocked but no answer.  Guess he's still pretty pissed and would probably only make snarky comments about it), in stores, all around town, even OUT of town--so...

...Where the hell ARE you?!

I'm worried, oh Ra... I've been trying to use Ramses to catch your scent, but wherever you are, it seems to have faded... he'd always follow it up to a certain point, but then stop, and when he did...

...Well... lets just say... Ramses is acting oddly...

So Noa and I never went on our meeting... I ended up staying with Seth, sleeping on the couch with him, way past our meeting time.

...I'm not really good with Kaiba's, huh?

I have to find Seth, and quickly.  I leave for Osaka soon... and I also have to find someone to watch over him while I'm away, if I can't get my manager to agree to let me take him along. (And it has to be a human, since Seth seems to dislike Ramses being his "babysitter".  But I have my reasons.  People aren't completely trustworthy... and Ramses is hella strong, and will protect Seth with all his might, need it be.)

Other Seth is still here, taking up the guest room.  I don't mind him around, even if he is a bit... interesting.

...Seth, I'm going to find you...

...

...Could it be that you are in the same place as last time...?

...Shit.

--Atemu

<small>Nothing ends perfectly.
That is reality.
Nothing ever goes right
Unless you put up a fight.
And even then you get
Not your Prince but The Knight
Storybook ending not
But to you does it feel right...?</small>

<lj-cut text="PRIVATE">

<small>[So... exactly...

...Who's The Knight...?

Everything is so confusing... I just... don't know... anymore.]</small>

</lj-cut>

--Atemu
So Moki just called me a few minutes ago from his cellphone. .... What do you MEAN Noa is back...? --Atemu

So, the other Seth has moved in...? For Ra's sake, not even three days after I move into a loft with Seth does something come along to ruin the sweet bliss... Welcome. --Atemu Niu PS: Seth, I am going to be away for a few days on business. Please, for the love of Horus, if you and your other self get hungry, order from the numbers I placed on the fridge, via phone. STAY OUT OF THE KITCHEN. If you don't know how to use the phone (which you should if you remember how it I use it), press the intercom button for the front desk, and the maid service team will assist you. Love, Atemu PPS: The birds can stay on the roof. Anywhere else and Ramses will be eating bird for the rest of the time Other Seth is here. PPPS: I MEAN IT. STAY OUT OF THE KITCHEN!

Well, luckily Seth is back.  Turned out Pegasus... you know, the crazed, bunny loving one... was holding him hostage, or something...

<lj-cut text="PRIVATE">

<small>[Okay, so... I went in, got Seth out, Mind Crushed Pegasus (I wonder if he has recovered?  Probably not... but then again, the Mind Crush I used was significantly weak compared to the one I gave Seto all those years back), and then hauled ass out of there, Seth in tow.  However...

Well, while I was taking care of him (bandaging, giving him fluids, the works... I ended up kissing him.

The first time, alright, I leaned in and then, BAM, out lips connected and we were both startled.  He was confused, I was confused... Jesus, he must have been confused...

But I had to go and make it worse by going and kissing him... AGAIN.  I don't know WHY I did it, honestly (there was no actual lust behind it--it was more like, at the time, it seemed like the right thing to do), but I did.  It was very... interesting.

I told him it wasn't because he looked like Seto.  Really, it wasn't.  After all, I had dated both Noa and the other Seto without my romantic thoughts towards them going anywhere around... him.  But I don't know WHAT to tell him.  Was I curious?  No... I really have no idea...

But I wish I could explain it--it would calm both him and I down.

I do have an odd... well, I guess maternal instinct over him.  After all, I wanted to CARRY him everywhere, and I nearly bit his head off when he wouldn't let me help him with anything or if he did something that could cause harm to him without my supervision.  I didn;t want him to get hurt.  Hell, I never want ANYONE to get hurt.

As to what to do, I have no idea.  I can;t pretend like it never happened, when indeed it did.

Also, I don't know Seth's feelings in regards to Seto.  Does he remember him at all?  The love they shared?  I am already making things too complicated.  Seth should be concentrating on his past relationship with Seto--not on me and my idiotically timed kisses!

....I don't know WHAT to do.

...And I wish I did.</lj-cut>

--Atemu Niu

...Where the hell is Seth?

No one knows why he was kidnapped, or who did it, or anything such as that!

...<small>Although I do have a sneaking suspicion...</small>

I'm off.  I'm about to go and Mind Crush someone.

--Atemu Niu

It seems as though yet again, our beloved priest has forgotten everything.

Yes... Seth is back.

<lj-cut text="The Story">

<small>I ended up finding him while out on a walk.  I had just moved into Seto's house a mere hour or so before I found him, in an alleyway surrounded by trash. <strike>He seems to have a penchant for ending up around garbage.</strike>  He was lost and confused, so, I took him back home.

He seems to have no clue as to exactly what's going on... not even the things in Egypt.  Oh, there's GOT to be SOMEWAY to get him to remember...

I got him back and got him to take a bath.  There I tried to fill him in about what he was blanking out on-- Egypt, the things here in this world--but, of course, this is a lot of informtaion to take in.  At least he is content with his own name, now.  I think Seto will do a better job in explaining these things.

I told him about Seto--he wants to meet him tomorrow.  

Anyhow, the night consisted mainly of talk, and then we decided to go to sleep.  We were originally in my bed, but I ended up moving to the couch <strike>and then Seth followed me there.  Great.  Right in full view for Seto to see, which I'm sure he did</strike>.  He seems to act like the Seth we knew... he just... forgot.

it should be easy for him to get back into the swing of things.

I'm sure Seto will be happy.</small></lj-cut>

Things are bound to get a lot more interesting...

--Atemu Niu

So I met Pegasus today.  It seemed as though he needed his bunny washed, since it got splattered with ink from his ink balloon he was going to use on Seto. 

Anynow, he's gone now, I suppose.

Needless to say, our meeting wasn't an entirely pleasant one.

<lj-cut text="EMOING.  Skip over this if you don't want to read.">

<small> And so, Pegasus comes over, even though I so graciously let him clean his ink-soaked bunny, and... and...

Tells me to give ups.  Says he questioning my IQ since I want to oh so BADLY keep pining after Seto.

Well you know what?  FUCK YOU.  I'll do whatever the hell I want.  I'm so fickle as to just give up on him like that!  I love him from the bottom of my heart, even though he;s said several times over he doesn;t feel the same way?

Wasting my life?  Throwing my happiness away?  HELL NO!

He IS my life.

He IS my happiness.

So butt the fuck out of my buisness and leave me be!</small>

</lj-cut>

Well, I suppose that was more along the lines of angry ranting, but you get the picture.

--Atemu Niu

Back to work!  Since the holidays are coming up, I'm going to be busier than ever.  Katsuya, that also means you better look forward to pumping in some extra hours in training!

Not much else to say.

However... there's a new Pegasus in town...?

<small>Hopefully things won't go astray with him around.  <strike>I'm kind of scared, actually...</strike></small>

--Atemu Niu

Still on break!  However, damn modeling work starts back up after the Labor Day holiday... =\

Way behind on the times, but... (In both aspects, oh har har, I should be a comedian~)

<lj-cut text="Meme I stole like a thief from Seto~">

A - Age: I have no idea.

B - Band listening to right now: Taking Back Sunday

C - Career: Model/Singer, King of Games

D - Drink or smoke: Drink when upset, and so stressed I'm seriously thinking about taking up smoking.

E - Easiest person/s to talk to: <strike>Does Ramses count?</strike> Seto, Hikari (kind of, but sometimes I don;t want to tell him things because I fear I may upset him)

F - Favorite song/s at the moment: "What's it feel like to be a ghost?" -- Taking Back Sunday, and "Over my Head" -- The Fray, and "Hate me" -- Blue October

G - Gummy Bears or Gummy Worms: Gummy worms

J - Junk foods you like: Doritos, Sprite and Dr. Pepper, chocolate with caramel filling~, this list could go on...

L - Longest car ride ever: I dunno, anytime when I get upset I need to take a drive, so, anyone of thoses is probably the longest... probably my most recent one...

M - My favorite Sport/s: Tennis and Soccer
 
N - Number of relationships you've had: Not sure.

O - One wish you have: I wish that Seto could share the feelings I share for him, but if I got the chance to actually wish for it, I couldn't, because that would be forcing him into it.

P - Phobias: Being alone forever and turning gray without ever finding love. 

Q - Favorite Quote: 

R - Reason to smile: Beautiful days, a job well done, Katsuya doing well in his training, seeing hikari happy, Seto.

S - Song: I think "What's it feel like to be a ghost?" by TBS and "Real World" by Matchbox 20 sum me up pretty well. 

T - Time you woke up: 7:20 am.

U - Unknown fact about you: I don't remember my birthday.

V - Vegetable/fruit you hate: I hate carrots!

W - Worst habit: Sucking on the tip of my thumb and biting my nails when worried or nervous.

X - X-rays you've had: Not sure.

Y - Yummy food/s: QUESO DIP AND CHIPS~!

Z - Zodiac sign: Not sure, seeing as how I don't know my own birthday...

</lj-cut>

...Now that I think about it, that's rather depressing...

...Maybe I should just... pick a day?  Not hikari's B-Day, that just seems... stupid.  Ah well... I suppose I'll think on it while I take my nap...

--Atemu Niu

So, what do most people do when they're bored? They complain, whine, and moan, or, they can find something to do. I, unfortunately, am the one that revels in it bored glory. What am I doing since I'm not working? Lounging around like bump on a log. Watching poker games on TV, as well as renting mystery thriller movies and murder mysteries. And that show I Detective completely ruled my life right now, seriously. I've even taken the time to go out to town and buy some new cards to tweak my deck. Yes. I went out to do something with my Duel Deck. I had seen some kids playing it table top at the park and I was inspired. Too bad I dunno who to test it out on, you know? ...Hey Seto, maybe you'd like to give it a try? --Atemu Niu

I have broken up with Seto and Noa.
Yes, you heard me. I did it. I couldn't take all the loneliness they ut me through, and all the nights spent alone while they worked, and they had each other so, basically... fuck you. Have a nice life. I'm sure it's better without me, since ignoring me was rather easy. In other news (other than the fact that I'm single AGAIN, oh joy), it seems that I need to buckle down on Kat's training soon. And Shiz, we need to go out when those casts come off. Also, it seems that Seto and I are starting to talk with each other a bit more, so that's always good. So, as for now, life is going smoothly. ...Anyone interested in purchasing a house? [Well, I asked Seto if it was alright for me to hang out with him sometimes, and he seemed completely alright with that. <3 I'm glad. I really missed him. I think this is the proper pace to move at, anyhow, to regain a stable sense of familiarity. I wish to try for him again. I want to ask him out on a date... eventually. Like, maybe in a few decades or so, maybe I'll be able to crack open Mr. No-Care by then, huh? Nothing else can be let in my heart now. Take the initiative, right?] --Atemu

Sit down. Don't you know what's gonna happen tonight? Nothin. Shut up. Don't you know What's gonna go down in my hood? Up high In the sky All alone is where I stand... Down low Far below I want to take your hand.. So what can I do tonight? Everything's not gonna be OK... So how can I live through the night? Knowing tomorrow brings nothing but pain...? It's gonna rain. Sweet love. Love that I can not have. I've tried enough time to share with the world My stories. Sweet pain. Pain so frighteningly dull I'm suprised I can still feel it when let down... Don't you know? Even if seems, impossible. Heros need love too? And don't you know? When the darkness in their mind and heart break through...? ...Well just be thankful you don't know! So... What can I do tonight? Everything's not gonna be OK... So how can I live through the night? Knowing tomorrow brings nothing but pain...? It's gonna rain. Anyhow... There's not much to do. I've been given a few weeks off from work. They said they needed some time to go work with a new model for a bit, so now I've been given some liberty until about September or so. Unfortunately, all I can really do is sit here, since Noa or Seto STILL won't call me. Since I have such a long time off, I can finally take Shiz out like I said, and probably work with Katsuya for a bit on his breathing and pitch. And even though it sounds horrible, maybe hit a couple of bars and see if there's anyone worth exchanging numbers with. There's not much to do anyhow, so I may as well get these things done while I can. Maybe I should call Seto-kun and see what's up? ...Maybe. And if I'm lucky, maybe he'll at least answer his god damned phone and talk to me and act like I'm a human being. [Seriously, I probably need to take a step back and reevaluate myself. I'm attractive, right, which is why I'm all over TV and on billboards and such things. I mean, I know not EVERYONE is attracted to me, but being a model means I do have SOME semblance of attractiveness, correct? I'm smart, I've clever, and I'm quick on my feet... I'm very well off and I have a great personality, so, can someone tell me exactly WHY can't I seem to keep a boyfriend? Or at least get the one I've been after for awhile? It's really something I need to think about. Am I dong something wrong? I mean, there's got to be SOMETHING. I'm going to blame it on acting too clingy. And I am, really, when I'm seeking something. I suppose I feel as if I must attach myself to someone for them to notice me, but when I have it I'm not nearly that horrible. After all, Noa and I then only saw each other at leisure. But now, it seems like I don't see ANYONE. I'm unhappy. I'm very glad my album is almost done, because I am returning from the music buisness after that, as well as modeling. I haven't told my bosses yet. I want to go back to gaming. Playing Duel Monsters, even though now it seems like odl hat. Perhaps I'll try another game instead? Poker, perhaps? There are many things to do out in the world, all I have to do is find it. However, even though this seems disturbingly fantasy-dream like, I really do wish to find love, SOMEWHERE. I think my hearts beaten enough. I already know I don;t like the pain. However... I don't like the pain of admitting defeat, either. Or never knowing what I could find... because I didn't keep trying. How many other people feel the same? There are a lot of things I already regret. I regret attempting to push Seto-kun into even THINKING about a possible relationship between us, even though, at the same time I don't and still long that, even though I have given up actively persuing it. Is that giving up? Does that count? It seems, in such a place, I have admitted defeat. That that mean I have lost? Even though my heart still fights for his attention? I haven't really though about him much. Well, that's a lie, but I haven;t thought about him as much as I had before. It has picked up, however, on the account of since my own boyfriends seemed to have simultaneously cut contact with me. ...Do they hate me? Have they found all the love they needed with the other? ...Am I the third wheel? It's true. Only I was upset when I found out Noa and Seto had been together. Only I was upset when they asked to be together, when they asked for my forgiveness. And like a fool, who wanted to desperately keep what little I had, gave into it. I suppose I knew all along it wouldn't work. Even though I wanted it to... if just to see that I was... or could act... happy. I hate that I was able to be so easily decieved. Aren't I the one who manipulates minds? Fuck it. I won't try anymore. I know who I love. I love Seto Kaiba, the one who stood by me with all that dream crap, the one Pegasus and I constantly bickered over, the one I saw in my dreams, in my visions, in my thoughts. The one I fell in love with. I wish people would stop telling me to forget. I don't want to. I wish he would stop giving me that regretful look. I don't want that, either. I hate it. I hate myself for loving him, and I hate myself for still trying even though I know he doesn't feel the same. He and I are both stubborn. Stubbornly in love, and stubbornly repellant. I love him, and no one else. Nothing will change that, and I won;t let it change. So now, I make an oath to myself. I, Atemu Niu, will close my heart forever. And he, Seto, will forever be the only one allowed to break it. Pain, stubborness, pride, and pure, pure, unconditional, unrequited love. I resign myself to this fate. I will stop trying. Because even though around Noa I can smile, even though around the other Seto I can laugh... my heart knows the truth. Only he can make me happy. And if that's what I want... I'll keep what I have locked up. If I don't... ...I might lose him not only in body, but in memory as well.] --Atemu Niu

*sighs*

There's nothing much to do anymore...

See the space in between my last entry and this one?  More than a month.  What has happened in between there?  Nothing more than Kat-chan and his boyfriend uniting, Shiz breaking her limbs, Seto-kun still in "Anti-Mokuba" euphoria, Ramses being the perfect pet, and Seto and Noa ignoring me.

...So what else is new.

Yeah, they're still ignoring me.  They haven't talked to be since...

...Since that fight I had with Seto.

*sighs* I don't even know what to do anymore.  Perhaps I should just give up!  Every relationship I tried for and wanted so badly, what happened to it?  Shot to hell.  Am I not meant to be in a relationship?  Am I just meant to go and waste my life, slaving away, without any personal life?  And its not just their fault.  I'm busy too, but I always try to call, or go over to their house when I'm off.  But they never answer their phones.  I've memorized their answering machines, even the part where Noa fumbles at "Leave a messager, er, message", I've heard it so much.  The door is never opened.  Calls are never returned.  I know they're getting them.

...And I'm lonely.

I know I'm being pathetic.  I know I'm being selfish, but I want someone to be with my right now, like Kat-chan had Mado, and Ryou had Malik, and Pharaoh has Amane... they're so lucky.  Do they realize how lucky they are?

Even if they don't, they still have it.  And me, who cherished every moment with the people I cared for with all my heart, can't even seem to find a single moment now.

It hurts, a bit.  No, a lot.  I talk to my pet more than my boyfriends.

If only once, right?

...I tried for Seto.  I was told to give Noa a chance.  he seemed to like me.  He cheated on me with the OTHER Seto.  Then WE got together.  Now...

...I don't know what to do.  And if only once...

...If only once, could something go right.

...If only once, could I reach for someone's hand... they'd reach back, and not only acknowledge it, or take it, they'd pull me up and take me with them.

...Just like the man I had in my dreams over a year ago.

Life is short, and fickle, and oh so confusing.

I'm glad its easy for some.

I wish mine could be like that, too.

--Atemu

So I go to Seto's house to thank him for housing me that one night...

And he's gone.

The only thing left standing is his house, but even all of his belongings are gone.  Like a ghost town.

...What the hell?

Then I read Ryou's journal and see that Malik's gone... and then I read Malik's journal and find out RYOU'S gone.

But Ryou's HERE!

...What's going on?

--Atemu

...So, I got in a fight, got drunk.  Whatever.

Who cares.  I decided to just go home.  I don't feel like talking with Seto or Noa anymore, really.

...Not for awhile.

<lj-cut text="Fucking OOC!Seto and him always giving me inspiration">

Howdy, ya'll! This is Atemu, returned from America after a long, busy, but pretty enjoyable trip. It was originally supposed to be only me going, but in the end, Noa and Seto tagged along with me (probably to see if I would cause any mischeif). However, it was the usual photoshoots and voice tests, and some INSANE amount of dance work for my new music video to the song, "Touch That Not This". And Seto, next time, try not to be so blunt with the whole "OMG, I'm fucking Atemu, wheee~!" stuff...okay? *blush* Anyhow, as I'm sure you all know, Kat-chan is living with me, and throwing Yuugi's birthday party at my house, so... yeah. O.o I still can't believe I gave him persmission for that. It makes me wonder when my OWN birthday is... do I just make something up? I have to get the Mokuba couple some presents for their own birthdays. Well, until next time, --Atemu Niu

Katsuya-kun has finally decided to go the route of the super sensational singer!  That's good.  That means, after my trip to America (don't worry, I'll be back on Tuesday, my adoring public!), we will begin the formal training!  Voice lessons, dance classes, a physical trainer... ah... the good old days!  Back to square one!  Lets see if Kat-chan can take the heat, shall we?

In other news, Noa and Seto are coming on my trip with me to America (darn it).  It also seems that Moki's birthday is soon.  I wonder what I should get him.  Oh, and Mokuba, too.  Hm.  Maybe something they can BOTH use... <strike>Like, I dunno, relationship counseling, maybe?</strike>

Well, gotta jet!  Need to pack!

--Atemu Niu

I don't think Noa minds me using his computer to update my livejournal (after five bajillion years), but I still feel guilty.

... There are very few words I can use to describe last night.  However, I have a small list.

Exciting

Erotic

New

Heartpounding

Breathless

Beautiful

...And, well, there's one more... but...

<lj-cut text="PRIVATE">

<small>If either of them hack into this I swear to RA I'll kill them.  The other word is "scared".  The was like... my first time... except for that time a year back, when I was dating Jounouchi.  But that doesn;t count, that was pretty much rape after all.  And then...

What if they don't like me?  What if they're only doing this to make me feel better, and they just want to be with themseleves and they think I'm just some whining crybaby who wants attention... well, right now the way i feel, they're probably right... but...  I mean, I know I love them with all my heart, but... I know it's horrid to think so, but, I'm still so unsure... as much as I really want this to work out.  What am I going to do to not feel scared?</small>

...I suppose I should get dressed now. All i'm wearing is the bedsheets...

Just a while ago, I bumped into my hikari, Yuugi.  I haven't seen him in such a long time... it was hard, almost, thinking of what to say.  There was so much to say, but... I don't know. 

Anyhow, I ended up staying the night, and finding some very interesting things about him in my absense as well..

</lj-cut>

Not much else to say.  Still waiting for Noa to get his (nice) ass in gear and give me a call sometime.

So I've been working.  Working and reading, reading and working...

... Not much else, really.

I don't know.  Something's missing.  I kind of miss visiting Pegasus... gossiping with PAtemu... walking with Seto and bickering with Other Me.

... Other Me...

... Noa's been gone for quite sometime... and he's only called like, what?  Once or twice?  Ramses is back, luckily.  At least I have him.

... Things are boring.  I need to DO something, talk to someone.

... Sometime.

<lj-cut text="(PRIVATE TO ALL EXCEPT THOSE LIVING IN DARTZ'S HOUSE)">

It's been a long night.

I went upstairs to the kitchen a couple of times to grab a snack, and every time I heard Seto inside his room, still awake.  Guess he was serious about stay up all night.

I just finished busying myself reading one of the new glossies that was out on the rack, letting one of the maids give me a manicure and pedicure.  Very nice. I'm supposed to have a photoshoot tomorrow, but maybe I'll pass on that one...

There wasn't much else to do this late at night, so I took out my old deck and began shuffling through it, wondering why there weren't anymore tournaments.  Ever.  I do rather miss it.

... When was the last time I felt my heart swell in excitement at the sight of a Blue Eyes White Dragon on the field...?

Ah well.  "The Glory Days" are over now, I suppose.

</lj-cut>

<lj-cut text="(PRIVATE FROM ALL)">

<small>Seto looks like he's in pain.  It looks like Noa laid a number on him, that's for sure.

The night before was quite exhausting.  After Noa and I bickering back and forth so horribly, i thought it would never end.  I know I deserved to be yelled at, but I think Noa was too cold at times.  i couldn't help but be defensive and snap back, which, in turn, only led to more problems.  In the end... well..

We don't have the problems SOLVED, but we're better than were were.

...It felt so wonderful to be in his arms again...</small>

</lj-cut>

To you know who:

I love you.

--Atemu

I've moved in with Dartz.  We seem to get along really well.   It's a bit boring when he's working, but I can entertain myself.  The place is massive. =O

Anyhow, I think we're going to be... the best of friends.

...I should really talk to Noa...

And on another note--has anyone seen Ramses?  He went missing a few days ago and I haven't seen him since...

I'll pay a large reward for anyone who find and returns him to me.

--Atemu

I think I had a pretty good day. OMR OMR OMR OMR OMR OMR OMRWTFBBQAOL! Now what? So we kissed. And a little more. I feel as if my heart is thrown out on the table--it's been so long since I felt... like this. I still have feelings for Seto... but his brother Noa comes out of left field and blindsides me with a soccer ball to the head, attempting to dull the senses and release my heart's hold on Seto. I must admit, I was caught up in the heat of the moment, and I can only blame myself, and Noa just said all the right things to me... I was completely ensnared. I don't know what to do. I told Noa I'd give him a chance--but I'd feel guilty if, while out and about with him, my mind was elsewhere. On Seto. ...I don't know what to do. I really don't. ... Ra guide me. Thank you for accompanying me and Ramses to the park, Noa. --Atemu

I met Noa Kaiba today at Starbucks.  He was looking decidedly... older. Now he looked to be the grand age of 17 or so.  I think all Kaiba's are doomed to have the same exact expressions.

However, this one seemed to use more of them.

I didn't get much time to talk, but I got a couple of number from him.  I guess he wants to hang out or something?

Sure, why not, right?  Not much else to do. <small> Besides, he is kinda cute.</small>

In other news, I have bought a new house, and then readopted my pet panther, Ramses.  I think he likes this new place better.  It is bigger than the apartment I had back in Chess City.  I even have a cute sports car now.  Drive it like you stole it, right?

I decided I'd crack down on my career again.  After all, I have a lot of new things to pay for.  And as a superstar, a lot more hearts to break!

--Atemu

Isis was kind enough to let me stay over at her house last night, after I had that horrid fight and more with Seto. I really shouldn't have came to her. I haven't spoken to her since that episode with the gods Seth and Horus and Khons and whatnot. It was fairly rude of me, but, I really didn't know where else to go at that moment. The "Fight-and-More" between Seto and I was... to say the least, utterly horrific, expecially my part in it. I wanted to tell Isis, but, I didn't know exactly WHAT to say. The truth would have been nice, but... I didn't want to say anything, really, so I gave her a horribly abbreviated version of it. I'm sorry, Isis. Perhaps you can tear it out of Seto... I left Isis and company early that morning, as to not disturb anyone. More than I already have, anyway. I didn't think I could ever get so bad. No wonder so many stories of me being a ruthless dictator back in Egypt circulate like wildfire. They're probably true... Ra dammit... I'm not STUPID. My method of getting Seto to hate me was extreme, but even though he SAYS he's not, he's so much more kind and gentle than he lets on to be. It was too much. But at least I've made sure he doesn't want to talk to me anymore. ...How could you ever look a monster like that in the face again...? Right now, I need to concentrate on finding a house for myself. yes, a house. Something stable and PERMANENT. That way, I can do... whatever I want with it! Perhaps I'll make it in momory of my Egyptian heritage? ...What am I thinking...? ... As if with the way my ups and downs are now... I'll even be alive that long... As of now, I'm looking for somewhere to stay. Maybe I'll buy a house? Something in my heart and mind tell me to try and talk with Seto, but by doing that, it would destroy the entire purpose of my... "life lesson" as he called it. ...Whatever. Time flies by In a blink of an eye Everything we see and know Changes, changes Faster than any wind Or any falling snow. The Weather outside Changes, changes Much slower than the weather In my head. Love, hate, anger, passion Lost in all infinity. Cut, bleeding fingers Brought to your pink lips Comfort gained, gained Every little thing done wrong Makes a cut into your heart Or whatever your have in there. Sometimes I wish That I cried blood. For if it was so, Every time I got hurt, When I cried I'd die a little faster. --Atemu

((OOC: HAPPY BIRTHDAY TO MEEEEEEEE!! ATEMU'S MUN, MACHIIII!! HAPPY BIRTHDAY DEAR MACHIIII!!! I'M FINALLY 19!!! WHEE!)) Mokuba asked for me to do some poses in some of his clothes from MmmK for him. ...Damn, did I look good. But then again, don't I always? Seto and I talked a bit. I think I can manage to not act all love obsessed around him, if that what he really wants. it's hard to do so, but he seems a lot more calm... and that makes me happy. --Atemu

...So, what am I supposed to do? Talk about feeling awkward. I haven't left my room all morning. ...What do I do...? ...What can I SAY? ...Want can I do to make it all right? Nothing, I suppose. ...Maybe it'd be easier if I just... ...I don't know... I felt odd, so, I guess here's some random drabble and poetry and all that. What else do you do? *~*~*~*~*~*~*~* An act to mesmerize all who's near... A dance to kiss away your fears... A song to shed to a tear to all who hear... All brought to life by the mask he wears... I kiss your lips I share a smile. In the end Your friends are worthwhile. Through all the drama Past all the hurt. Stick together We'll make it work... I try to be optimistic... To tell me "Be realistic"... No matter what I'm told, I'll make it through-- Cause I told you... I go about my life Here's what I say: "I've got some enemies, But they won't have their way!" I face the rivals, I try and try, I won't be beat and someday I can soar high! I try to be optimistic... You tell me "Hopes are sadistic"... No matter what I'm told-- I'll seize the day! I'll go my way Cause life's Cliche... ---Storytime--- I'm used to it by now, really. Life is nothing short of a game. And for me, the King of Games, I am sorely losing it. This is a total, one-sided beat down. But life goes on. Or at least, the days do. If you ask someone the definition of life, you will get different answers. The time span in which you live. The events that take place within that time span. Some will give you an answer filled and dutifully crafted with woven, whimsical words that fill the page with an artistic flair. Others will slowly recall things that make there life what is it today, full with subtle shyness and a soft, gentle voice that shall only reach the ears of those who care to hear it. For me, however, the answer is short, blunt, and to the point. To the point, where, it makes some people uncomfortable. Life is nothing with Seto Kaiba. Here's the deal, however. How many more times must I weave the same words over and over again? How many times must I slowly say them, hoping not to scare him off, or spirit him away, due to words alone? How about this: Seto Kaiba, you really piss me off. One, stop fucking around with people who hate you and your company, you fucking masochist. Two, don't tell me you don't want to look for love when you pine after Seth. You're a Ra-damned hypocrite. Three... ...I don't even know anymore. There's a lot inside of me... so much anger and love and hate and excitement and fury... so much emotion... I just... I'm going to burst. What do I do with it all? ...Why does it all have to center around HIM? I've tried to find someone else. I really have. I tried here in Domino, I've tried other actors and dingers and models like myself, tried the people in the foriegn lands I visited the months I was gone... I tried and tired, letting them get close enough to see me, but not enough to get a chance further than a kiss. Not until i could rid myself of that... that man that I am so desperately, hopelessly in love with. And I hate it. I hate that I can't do anything to stop it, hate myself for making him feel how he does now. Am I so worthless? I know he cares for me, and I care for him, but it's different, it's not the same kind, or the same way, and I can never, ever hope to get him to feel the way that I do. He told me it won't happen, and what Seto Kaiba says won't happen, WON'T happen. But I'm still here anyway. Still desperately clinging and hoping, because that's all I have left. If I let go, then what will I have? Nothing. Not even that sad, pitiful, pathetic little hope for change. I'm weak. I'm pathetic. I'm clingy. I'm hopeful, foolish, idiotic, moronic, pleading, deperate, and most of all, the thing I hate the most... Like a bad star, I'm falling. What can I do? What can I say? Nothing. Absolutely nothing. Just like my hopes, my dreams, my heart... And my future. I am absolutely nothing. And if that's all I ever get for giving my heart and soul and entire being to loving him, that intelligent, beautiful, mind-defying man, you know what? ...So be it. Anyhow, I'd better find something to do. It's getting boring just laying here. --Atemu Niu

Well, now that I'm back in my own original body, everything is... sort of back to normal.  It was a bit fun messing with Mokuba as I threatened the peace of Moki's body, but I never planned to do anything to it.  But it was still fun.

I'm still living in one of the guest rooms in Seto's house.  Mokuba asked if I would be an MmmK model for him.  It does sound like fun.  It also gives me something else to do than lay around like a lifeless lump.

<small>But then again, maybe that's all I am, now.</small>

I walk by Seto's room sometimes and hear him typing.  It's a rather peaceful sound.

<small>I've also been reading up and hearing about how well Mokuba and Moki or Malik and Ryou are doing.  Why are THEY so lucky?</small>

I really need something to do. <small>And someone to hold on to.  I think I'm beginning to suffer withdrawls.  Even thought Kaiba didn't care for me that much, at least he let he snuggle with him...</small>Everything seems to be just falling apart again.

....Ah well.

...Not as if there was anything held together to begin with.

I was thinking about how to solve it, but then I mentally berated myself.

<small>Curse my want to keep the promise we made each other so long ago, Seto...</small>

--Atemu Niu

So I get turned down <strike>by yet another Kaiba</strike> again, and end up running to Seto. <strike>You know.  The one that I liked to begin with and still do and tried to forget through means of the other?</strike>  I was soaking wet upon entering his house, and crying and everything else completely unattractive (unless one has a superhero complex).  

However, as per usual, the kind Seto managed to show his soft side and allow me to stay with him.

As usual.

That sounds pathetic.  And it is.

Just like me.

I went to bed, completely devistated... only to wake up and fine out that I had shrunk.  I mean, I knew Kaiba's PJs were large on me, but this was ridiculous.  However, I noticed that my hair had grown longer--much longer--and was now to my knees and dark, dark black.  I scrambled to a mirror, noticing my even MORE apparent lack in height, and took a look in.

....Holy crap.

...I was Mokuba.

And not the Mokuba who's obessed with dressing up his brother and getting off as much as he can each day.  Oh no.  The latter.  The kinder, smiling, nicer version of the little one we all came to know.

Moki.


I was... in MOKI'S body.

...Well.

This will be interesting.

--Atemu
